alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 3:17AM CDT until April 01 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN MADISON...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 317 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of New Market, or 12 miles northeast of Moores Mill, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Hazel Green, Decherd, Huntland, Lincoln, Lexie Crossroads, Plevna, Jericho, Elora and Maxwell. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
